name: Frosty Fish Frenzy
description:
The winter  is around the corner (at least in the southern hemisphere...), so let's stock up on some fish! 

You need to catch as many fish as you can without falling in the water. Be careful, because when you step on thin ice, it cracks and then breaks.

A game by Felipe Buson.

Made in a week for the Godot Wild Jam #44.
